roleset.name: puncture or scratch the surface of
roleset.note: Roleset based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. VN class cut-21.1-1. No framenet class. Framed by Katie

example.name: Puncture example
example.text: Karo and Hamer women of Ethiopia scarify themselves to render their bodies sexually appealing.
example.arg: Karo and Hamer woman of Ethiopia
to render their bodies sexually appealing.
